titleStmt.title: Censura cleri, or A plea against scandalous ministers, not fit to be restored to the churches livings in point of prudence, piety, and fame. By a true lover of the Church of England in doctrine, ceremony and discipline.
titleStmt.author: Barnard, John, d. 1683.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Giles Calvert at the Blackspread-Eagle at the West end of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: A true lover of the Church of England = John Barnard.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Blackspread-Eagle at the West end of Pauls
